full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,RGYAL GSOL GYI CHO GA 'PHRIN LAS LHUN GRUB CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B (RGYAL GSOL GYI CHO GA 'PHRIN @013A *, ,LAS LHUN GRUB CES BYA BA, 'DI NI RTA MGRIN GYI RNAL 'BYOR PAS RGYAL PO SKU LNGA BSTEN MCHOD BYED PA'I BREL CHAGS SHING, ,GSOL MCHOD DGOS PA'I SKABS KYANG MANG DU MCHIS PAS, ,MCHOD CHO GA 'KHYER BDE ZHIG CHOS SKOR KHRID DU 'GOD PA SKABS SU BABS PAR BSAN NAS KU SA LI ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS YIG SNYING DANG GONG MA LNGA PA CHEN PO'I GSUNG RNAMS LAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI AA NANTA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
